name: Scanner (Paraave)
description:
YOU ARE RESPONSIBLE FOR THE AIR CONTROL SECURITY IN THE REGION.

THERE ARE 3 TYPES OF PLANES:

-STANDARD (GREEN):

THE ONLY PLANE YOU CAN CONTROL. LEFT CLICK TO SELECT IT AND RIGHT CLICK TO CHANGE ITS COURSE.  ONLY ONE FLIGHT WILL BE SELECTED AT A TIME.  AN ARROW WILL SHOW THEIR DESIGNATED AIRSTRIP, THEY WILL ONLY LAND THERE. THERE ARE 4 AIRSTRIPS: NW, SW, SE OR NE.

-VIP (YELLOW): 

THE FASTEST OF THE THREE, IT WILL DIRECTLY GO TO THEIR AIRSTRIP.

-SOS (RED): 

SLOW, BUT WILL CHANGE OF COURSE SEVERAL TIMES BEFORE LANDING.

LAND PLANES IN ORDER TO INCREASE YOUR SCORE. YOU CAN USE THE SPACE BAR TO SLOW TIME, BUT AT A COST OF POINTS.

ONCE THE SCANNER HAS MADE A 360º SWIPE THE DAY WILL END AND ALL THE FLIGHTS WILL LAND, A NEW DAY WILL START AND THE DIFFICULTY WILL INCREASE.

PEOPLES LIVES ARE AT STAKE, CRASHING TWO PLANES WILL AUTOMATICALLY LOSE THE GAME.

GOOD LUCK.

CONTROLS: LEFT MOUSE CLICK->SELECT. RIGHT MOUSE CLICK->REDIRECT. SPACE BAR->SLOW TIME. ESC->PAUSE GAME.
